name: Swing Up!
description:
The new and most funny Swinging Game!

Jump from the swing performing spectacular poses, strides, back flips, flying and spiral leaps, from swing to swing, flying through incredible landscapes! Become the greatest star of the swing!

Go as far as you can making the maximum number of flips and flights as you move from swing to swing. Win more and more points by swinging and making the most amazing poses. Get new characters and accessories and continue swinging to infinity!

Easy to play but full of challenges: the difficulty grows while you get more points depending on your ability. You’ll come back and again to improve your swings and set the world record!

SWING UP features:

- Fly performing amazing poses, flips and more super effects with just one finger!
- Unlock new characters and customize them.
- Improve your characters, train them to be the King of the Swing!
- Many elements such as cannons, piñatas and balloons to multiply the fun.
- Collect incredible Companions that help you move forward.
- Realistic physics engine with prediction of the arrival point.
- Play without the need of an internet connection, so you can take it everywhere!
- Fast and replayable, play and play non-stop in this endless game!

Do you remember how you enjoyed swinging? Now you can swing to infinity!

Have fun and thanks for playing SWING UP!

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/swing-up/id1297265654?l=es&ls=1&mt=8
